Perform oral-pharyngeal suction.sentence: The healthcare provider prepares the suctioning equipment for the oral-pharyngeal suction procedure.
Perform oral-pharyngeal suction.subject: The healthcare provider

Perform oral-pharyngeal suction.sentence: The healthcare provider positions the patient comfortably to facilitate access to the oral cavity.
Perform oral-pharyngeal suction.subject: The healthcare provider

Perform oral-pharyngeal suction.sentence: The healthcare provider dons sterile gloves to maintain hygiene during the suctioning process.
Perform oral-pharyngeal suction.subject: The healthcare provider

Perform oral-pharyngeal suction.sentence: The healthcare provider inserts the suction catheter into the patient's mouth while ensuring not to stimulate the gag reflex.
Perform oral-pharyngeal suction.subject: The healthcare provider

Perform oral-pharyngeal suction.sentence: The healthcare provider activates the suction to remove secretions from the oral-pharyngeal area, monitoring the patient's response throughout the procedure.
Perform oral-pharyngeal suction.subject: The healthcare provider
